snippet: Conservative churches are uniting with more liberal denominations to educate against, and combat the devastating effects of, high-interest “payday loans.”
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column relates how unusually diverse coalitions of Christians are taking up fight against predatory lending practices, including so-called payday loans; notes groups have apparently made headway in fight, citing Consumer Financial Protection Bureau's release of long-awaited plan to regulate payday loans.
lead_paragraph: Conservative churches are uniting with more liberal denominations to educate against, and combat the devastating effects of, high-interest “payday loans.”

headline.main: Full Faith and Credit: Christian Groups Unite Against Predatory Lending
headline.print_headline: Full Faith and Credit: Christians Unite Against Predatory Lending
